item.title: Jamie Dimon issues rare CEO criticism of Trump's immigration policy: 'I don’t like what I’m seeing'
item.description: American CEOs have mostly avoided direct criticism of Trump's policies over the past year.

item.title: Trump signals he has a favorite for Fed chair: 'Down to maybe one, in my mind'
item.description: The president said a search that began in September and once included as many as 11 candidates is nearly over.
